name: Jet Random Members Widget
author: Jettochkin

sections.description:
en: Create a cloud of users on your social network! Do you have many users? Do you want more communication? Install this widget!
Provides random members avatar with link to profile

ru: Создайте облако пользователей Вашей социальной сети! У Вас много пользователей? Хотите больше коммуникаций? Установите этот виджет!

!!!!!!!!!!!
ru: Данная версия плагина не будет поддерживаться в новых версия BuddyPress (1.2.5.1 и выше), взамен будет новый плагин:
en: This version of the plug will not be supported in the new version BuddyPress (1.2.5.1 and above) will return the new plugin:

Jet Unit Site Could (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/jet-unit-site-could/)
!!!!!!!!!!!

Live demo (need registration)

! backward compatibility with 1.1.3

Contact

For suggestions, bugs, hugs and love can be donated at the following locations.

Authors page

Plugin page
sections.installation:
1. Upload j-rnd-members.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Upload ‘goall.png’ to the ‘images’ directory your theme (or other)
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Add widget to site
  5. Set Title, Count and Image Path (eg: /wp-content )
sections.changelog:
1.3

Change readme note!

1.2.5

  • Add BP 1.2.5 compatibility

1.2

  • Tested compatibility with WordPress 3.0

1.1.1

  • Add BP 1.2.4.1 compatibility

1.0

  • Ability to provide a link to the members header
  • Correction code and localization

0.3

  • Compatibility with 1.1.3 and 1.2.1

0.2.1

  • Change descriptions and links

0.2

  • Add button-link to the members list

0.1

  • First Release.
